column4: folks, I've made htpc with xbmc from ubuntu maverick. Now I have problem, when I connect to my house wifi it asks for password ones, but every time it asks for KEYRING password. How can I avoid this, I mean how to prevent ubuntu for asking keyring password. THX ppl!
*once
I can't enter keyring password every time as I don't have keyboard :/
go into wifi settings and for that SSID/connection, set it to be "available to all users". This requires a keyboard once tho

Ah! Well you can either use a totally passwordless keyring
Or you can allow the network-manager parts to use the keyring fully trusted
